page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: At the present time there is a lot of unemployment in Britain,but not in our area.Several people commute to {Harrogate,Knaresborough,Leeds}and{York 18 people work locally in Agriculture while the{Nursing Home}at Goldsborough Hall employs 50 people. {G.S.P.K.,}who make electric circuit boards on the Manse Lane commercial estate owns 10 acres. 60% of the site has already been used.The company employs 300 people.The following firms are also there:Timberform wood, Claro Precision Engineering, Rexdane,Tomrods Caygills Bus Co.Greenbank Transport. There are many others.Near{Flaxby there is a Potato Factory. It employs around 76 people. They put potatoes, peas,sweed, carrots into bags,and also make chips out of potatoes.They also make plastic bags.
